channel.title: MATLAB on Shreyas Ragavan
channel.description: Recent content in MATLAB on Shreyas Ragavan

item.title: Design of an Electro-mechanical prosthetic finger, and a PID controller for the wrist.
item.description: This project utilized MATLAB, Solidworks to research and design a human finger and calculate the range of it’s motion. SIMULINK is also utilised to design a PID controller for the wrist.
